column4: Can someone help me install the sun-java6-jre  ?  I'm really screwed because I installed a open source version and ubuntu packages keep referencing the sun one, now nothing new will install without it.
I'm using 10.04, universe repository is enabled.. And it can't find the package.
Package sun-java6-jre is not available, but is referred to by another package.
enable the partner repos in Software Sources then the sun packages will be available
